providerNotFound: no provider was found, please install related extensions(Metamask)
dexonProviderNotFound: no provider was found, please install related extensions(Dekusan)
browserNotSupport: you browser didn't support wallet, please use chrome/firefox/opera instead
accountNotFound: Didn't detect any account, please login to wallet plugin first
startChallengeDesc: Challenger start a challenge which need complete {targetDays} days in {totalDays} days.
createGroupError: Create group failed. Duplicated group id.
connectNotOpen: Didn't connect to contract, please refresh page or try again later.
challengeNotFound: Challenge not found or has finished.
completeDesc: Only complete {targetDays} days to achieve the goal.
sponsorContent: Sponsor to encourage challenger in the goal. If successful, challenger will get your sponsor. If failed, your sponsor will 100% back to you, and will also get challenger's amount.
createDataError: There's an error in create group data
shareDesc: I just start a {totalDays} days walking challenge with {amount}, sponsor and encourage me to hit the target!
challengeDesc: Achieve rate grater than {rate} can get
landing.desc: According to behavioral psychology, it takes 21 ~ 90 days to form a new habit. CoinChallenges let you form habits effortlessly by using cryptocurrency.
landing.desc.item.1.title: Form Habits
landing.desc.item.1.desc: Set up how many days do you want to form a habit.
landing.desc.item.2.title: Gamification
landing.desc.item.2.desc: Put your cryptocurrency into smart contract. The more cryptocurrency you put in, the more likely you will be to achieve the goal!
landing.desc.item.3.title: Earn Cryptocurrency
landing.desc.item.3.desc: After you succeed, you can get back all of your cryptocurrency and also can get sponsors from your friends.
landing.desc.item.4.title: Social Sharing
landing.desc.item.4.desc: Share your challenge via social media and let friends encourage you.
landing.desc.item.5.title: Sponsor
landing.desc.item.6.title: Secure
landing.desc.item.6.desc: Verified trusted smart contract ensures your cryptocurrency is secure.
about.desc: Different from most current Dapps, CoinChallenges aims to make block chain can be used more easily with our life, that's why we choose reward mechanism that hope users can get rewards when they play Dapps.
section.tips.desc: Make challenge easier succeed and get more bonus by tips below
withdraw.error: Withdraw error, please confirm you balance in CoinChallenges
min.amount.error: Can't less then group's min amount {amount}
error.invalid.group.id: Invalid groupId, please input number only
error.invalid.group.name: Group name can't be empty
